verses.text: ‘EIKI, hamusi au mei he kakai kovi: Tauhi au mei he ‘eiki fakamālohi:
‘A ia kuo nau fa‘u ‘a e ngaahi kovi ‘i honau loto; ‘Oku nau o‘i tau ‘i he kotoa ‘o e ‘aho.
Kuo nau fakamata honau ‘elelo ke hangē ko e ngata; ‘Oku ‘i honau te‘enifo ‘a e me‘a kona ‘o e ata. (Sila!)
‘Eiki, lehilehi‘i au mei he nima ‘o e angahala; Mei he ‘eiki fakamālohi ke ke tauhi kita: ‘A ia kuo nau fakakaukau ke mio‘i ‘eku laka.
Kuo fufū ‘e he fielahi ha hele kiate au, mo e ngaahi kafa: Kuo nau fola kupenga he tafa‘aki hala; Kuo nau ‘ai kiate au ‘ani helepuna. (Sila!)
Na‘a ku pehē kia Sihova, Ko hoku ‘Otua ‘a e ‘Afiona: Fakaongo, ‘Eiki, ki he le‘o ‘o ‘eku hufekina.
‘Ātonai Sihova ē, ‘a e ivi ‘o hoku fakamo‘ui, Na‘a ke pūlou‘i hoku ‘ulu ‘i he ‘aho ‘o e fepaki.
‘Oua ‘e ‘ange, ‘Eiki, ‘a e manako ‘a e angahala; ‘Oua ‘e fakaai ‘ene fakakaukau hala. (Sila!)
Ka hiki honau ‘ulu ‘e he kakai ‘oku kāpui au, ‘Ofa ke ‘ufi‘ufi kinautolu ‘e he kovi ‘o honau loungutu.
Ke tō kiate kinautolu ‘ani maka ‘afu: Ke lī ki he afi ‘a kinautolu; Ki he ngaahi luo, ke ‘oua te nau toe tu‘u.
Ko e tangata ngutu kovi ‘e ‘ikai tu‘u ma‘u ‘i māmani: Ko e tangata fakamālohi ‘e tuli tāupaua ‘e he kovi.
‘Oku ou ‘ilo ‘e taukapo‘i ‘a e tu‘utāmaki ‘e Sihova, Mo e totonu ‘a e kau masiva.
‘Ā, ko e kau mā‘oni‘oni te nau fakamālō‘ia ho huafa: ‘E nofo ‘a e angatonu ‘i ho ‘ao na.
